product_name: Bumble and bumbleHairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat Protectant Leave In Conditioner Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingBumble and bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat Protectant Leave In Conditioner Primer is a multitasking leave-in conditioner spray that delivers 86% more hydration, instantly cuts frizz by 50% + provides heat protection up to 450 degrees.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll-day frizz reductionProvides heat protection up to 450¬∞F/232¬∞CUV Filters help protect hair against the drying effects of the sunDetangles, smoothes and softensColor-safeAllure Best of Beauty 2023 WinnerResearch Results97% say hair looks shiny, less frizzy*96% say it reduces look of flyaways*95% say hair's easier to style**Consumer testing on 180 women after one use.FeaturesPatterns: Curly (3C‚Äì3A), Wavy (2C‚Äì2A), Straight (1A)Diameters: Fine, Medium, ThickConditions: Dry, Untreated, Color-Treated, or hair damaged from Heat, Chemical, or Physical stylingItem 2516141How To UseOn day one, apply to damp hair, rake through, and style. On day two (and so on), apply to dry hair to refresh and restyle.PRO TIPSMist from mid-lengths to ends, working through your hair by squeezing it in. Air-dry for natural styles or blow-dry with a round or flat brush for smooth, straight styles.Some areas of the hair may be more (or less) porous than others. Take some time massaging into hair after spraying to help absorb evenly.When detangling, try using a wide tooth comb. It's a great way to help prevent breakage.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, PEG-12 Glyceryl Dimyristate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Dimethiconol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, BHT, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, PhenoxyethanolBb.Products are free from parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and formaldehyde.Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients, refer to the product packaging.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: On day one, apply to damp hair, rake through, and style. On day two (and so on), apply to dry hair to refresh and restyle.PRO TIPSMist from mid-lengths to ends, working through your hair by squeezing it in. Air-dry for natural styles or blow-dry with a round or flat brush for smooth, straight styles.Some areas of the hair may be more (or less) porous than others. Take some time massaging into hair after spraying to help absorb evenly.When detangling, try using a wide tooth comb. It's a great way to help prevent breakage.
ingredients: and formaldehyde.Ingredients are subject to change at the manufacturer's discretion. For the most complete and up-to-date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Amazingggg
reviews.comments: I'm on my 4 or 5th bottle of this! My hair is thin and doesn't handle heavy products well. This product leaving my hairy super soft and shiny. HIghly recommend.

reviews.headline: Love this product!!!!
reviews.comments: This product is a little expensive but lasts and it worth the cost.  My hair feels great when I use it.  It's a great leave in after shampooing.  It is not too heavy on my straight and thin locks.  Bumble and Bumble products are FABULOUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.headline: My go-to
reviews.comments: I have been using bumble and bumble's invisible oil spray for several years now and I don't think I would ever switch. I use a blow dryer and a flat iron on a regular basis, and this product protects my hair so well. It gives it shine and softness, and reduces the frizz. Love it!

reviews.headline: Does What I want..
reviews.comments: I initially started using this as a heat protectant, as I started blow drying my hair out more often. However my major plus is the reduction of frizz left over from my natural wavy, gray & highlights. I have oily scalp, so I was reluctant to try this and if I just place it at my temples and in areas that I get frizz and comb through it, does the trick.

reviews.headline: Works great and smells great too!
reviews.comments: This stuff is AWESOME!! I have very thick hair which is a bit wavy, but not enough to wash and go. I use this product on towel dried hair to comb/pick through after my shower and then I use it on dry hair before curling or straightening. It smells great too.

reviews.headline: Finally a One-and-Done Leave-In Hair Treatment For Me
reviews.comments:
The Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat/UV Protective Primer works well for my straight, thick "Asian" hair (unlike Bond-Building Repair Hair Oil Serum, which did nothing but deposit gunky residue in my hair). It moisturized and softened my hair amazingly, added shine and helped it be more manageable/styleable, as well as appearing to help protect it from blow drying (but I don't use high heat or extensive blow drying time). 

As a heat protectant, I strongly prefer this over some of the alcohol-based sprays that always dry out my hair and make it feel damaged.

It also does not have a strong scent which is nice for someone like me who is sensitive and allergic to fragrances. (The scent is barely detectable. It is mild, pleasant and inoffensive.)

I usually use a bunch of different leave-in products after washing my hair -- to soften, to condition/moisturize, to add shine, "bond repair," help hold style, protect from heat, etc. -- but I think this one takes care of all of those. I'll repurchase this for sure.

reviews.headline: Holy grail üôåüèº The best detangler for delicate hair!!
reviews.comments: Going through chemotherapy treatment that caused hair thinning (not hair loss), I was trying to save my hair but noticed my hair would be extremely matted after washing gently and conditioning. This was hands down the only product that was effective in gently detangling my hair without making it either frizzy or oily like other detanglers and allowed for the least hair shedding during my treatments. 1,000/10 recommend!!

reviews.headline: OMB&B
reviews.comments: Today's the first time my thick hair is soft, shiny and manageable! Wish I had "Bumbled" on this product years ago.

reviews.headline: BUY IT
reviews.comments: I have 2c hair that is a pain to style. My husband calls my hair "fluffy" after blow drying. Not with this miracle product. He had to find new descriptor words for my hair. Styling after blow drying took 1/4th of the time. This is the holy grail and i wish i bought this sooner.

reviews.headline: I wish I found this product sooner
reviews.comments:
I sprtiz on my wet hair in the morning before I dry.
Blow dry my hair with a round brush and this product 
makes my hair so smooth.
I highly recommend it for ladies with wavy hair that would like a smooth look.

reviews.headline: Can't live without it, but you have to figure your dosage
reviews.comments: Natural silvers to mid back, and this is amazing.  I spray about 8 sprays in my hands and rub together bottom side and another 8 for the top side, it protects well and minimal frizz even on humid Mi days. Hightly recommend for dry and fragile hair.

reviews.headline: This product lasts forever ! Yes I would buy it again.
reviews.comments: My hair loves this product. The waves become curly ! üòç

reviews.headline: 1 year review after using this product
reviews.comments: Ive bought this product 3 times this past year, i dont put heat in my hair a lot but maybe once a week. I first bought the sample size and was first amazed on how shiny and smooth it left my hair. After running out i bought the big bottle. Needless to say im in love with this product it smells amazing leaves my hair smooth and shiny and actually protects my hair! I get a lot less fall out and my hair is naturally curly and after putting heat my hair goes back into its natural bouncy curls. Do I recommend this product? Absolutely! Will i buy it again? Of course. Do i hope someday i can get free bottles for life? Please! But i dont mind spending the money for a good product that keeps my hair healthy.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love how my hair looks and feels

reviews.headline: Nice!
reviews.comments: Works great! Doesn't weigh-down or make my fine hair stiff. Smells great too!

reviews.headline: Nice result blowdrying and as a refreshed
reviews.comments: I received a sample, and first use this on two day post shampoo hair, it added sheen and body. Today I used on freshly shampooed hair, it helped with frizz, ease of blow dry, added sheen. For reference I have color treated shoulder length hair that I wear in a straight style with a little curve at the ends. By the way, the drybar blow dry brush I purchased at Ulta helps immensely.

reviews.headline: Works very well
reviews.comments: This is my new favorite leave in conditioner! It keeps my curls hydrated and it's lightweight which is nice. With this product, I no longer need to buy two separate products for my leave in or heat protection. Highly recommended if you have thick, coarse hair like me.

reviews.headline: Great hair days ahead!
reviews.comments:
This leave in conditioner is outstanding! I have boght a lot of hair products over the yeats. This is the first that i can describe as  transformative.

While blow drying, It instantly imparts and then locks in perfectly balanced moisture. The result is truly silky smooth, sleek hair that so many products promise but don't deliver.

Congratulations. You can now stop looking for a great leave-in conditioner. Get this one.

reviews.headline: love, love, love
reviews.comments: this makes my hair so soft and it doesn't weigh my hair down or make it feel gross. smells good, too!

reviews.headline: My ride or die leave in conditioner
reviews.comments: I loooovve this leave-in conditioner. I tried it for the first time a couple years ago, looking for something that wouldn't weigh down my finer, wavy hair and this was it. I have never used anything different since. It's lightweight, smells good and makes my hair super soft.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I initially intended to purchase only the invisible oil - not the primer, but after reading reviews, I figured I would give them both a try. Here's my assessment:

If I wear my hair wavy (scrunch out of the shower with the usual styling cream and setting spray and allow to dry naturally), the primer actually works SO well that it gets rid of a lot of my volume, so I don't use it anymore for wavy days. However, on day two of my messy/wavy bed-head look, the oil is great for killing frizz & making my unbrushed hair look sexy vs looking like a disaster. I don't wash my hair every day, so a fresh look for day two is frequently a challenge.

On blow dry and style days, the primer & oil combo are excellent - My hair blow drys quickly and is silky smooth. It actually seems to hold a curl better too - even through the night and into the next day (with no other styling products). I am able to brush out my 1 1/2" curls from the day before, apply 1 pump of invisible oil to kill bed head frizz, and my style is fresh again. I'm amazed - seriously.
faceoff_positive.headline: Frizz Killer

faceoff_negative.comments: I really wanted to love this stuff. Thought it might provide something unique, setting it apart from everything else out there ("styling sprays," leave-ins, blow-dry preps, etc.). Can't say that it really stood out from some other things I have tried. Seems to detangle well, and I happen to love the fragrance. Did not seem to provide any particular heat protection. Much to my chagrin, I feel wishy-washy about it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Don't dislike, but don't love.
